Item.Name: CodeSnippets
Item.Caption: Code Snippets
Item.Description: The demo project shows ability to insert frequently used fragments of the code into the editor. Press "Ctrl + K + X" to see snippets.
Item.Note: Code snippets are fragment of code intendend to be reused at a later time. Code snippets can be inserted into the editor by pressing Tab key after snippet shortcut or by executing code snippet popup window with Ctrl + K + X key sequence. If some fields are declared in the code snippets, editor allows to modify their values allowing to update field value inside whole snippet.
